Meeting.text: You must be... well, that doesn't really matter right now.
This place certainly is a mess, isn't it?
Good thing you and I are here to clean things up.
... I don't know who they might be, or who they might have been.
So long as they don't get in your way, everything should be fine...
I see you have a knife.
That won't do. Not for long, at least.
I think there is a sword around here somewhere. Keep an eye out for it.
Why don't I help you fight off those creatures?
Oh my dear friend, that is a part of my CHOICE.
You made yours, and I made mine.

WaitOnSword.text: I have nothing more to say.
Get the sword, then return to me.
